layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600

    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584

          text run at (0,20) width 553: "\"Peach,\" \"Plum,\" and \"Pear\" should appear. Before, we were clipping out \"Plum\" and \"Pear.\""
